name: Cave Explorers
description:
Play as a member of the Cave Explorers. A team of specialist puzzle solvers who's role is to dodge traps and decipher clues in order to unlock hidden rooms and treasures for archaeologists to study.



Cave Explorers contains a wide variety of puzzles that will test your mechanical, intellectual and logic problem solving skills.
There are a number of unique zones to explore including: Desert, arctic, rainforest and a mystery zone.
